doc:
Hilary Haag https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hilary_Haag 0 Hilary Haag (born January 3, 1972 in Baytown, Texas) is an American voice actress who is known for her work for ADV Films/Sentai Filmworks. Haag has been involved in a number of lead roles in anime series from ADV films, including ten-year-old teacher Rebecca Miyamoto in Pani Poni Dash, Nene Romanova in Bubblegum Crisis Tokyo 2040, Teletha Testarossa in the Full Metal Panic series, and Chloe in Noir. She attended Lamar Consolidated High School and later studied English Rhetoric at Texas A University. Haag resided in Los Angeles for almost 2 years after she graduated from Texas A University, but moved back to Houston where she grew up. Because of her distinctive natural child like voice, she is often given the roles of younger female characters. Hilary_Haag ( born January_3_,_1972 in Baytown , Texas ) is an_American_voice_actress who is_known for her_work for ADV_Films/Sentai_Filmworks . Haag has_been_involved in a_number of lead_roles in anime_series from ADV_films , including ten-year-old_teacher_Rebecca_Miyamoto in Pani_Poni_Dash , Nene_Romanova in Bubblegum_Crisis_Tokyo_2040 , Teletha_Testarossa in the_Full_Metal_Panic_series , and Chloe in Noir . She attended Lamar_Consolidated_High_School and later_studied English_Rhetoric at Texas_A . Haag resided in Los_Angeles for almost_2_years after she graduated from Texas_A , but moved back to Houston where she grew up . Because_of her_distinctive_natural_child like voice , she is_often_given the_roles of younger_female_characters .
